name: Meter.io Staked MTRG
description: Liquid Staked MTRG (stMTRG) is a token that represents staked MTRG in Liquid Staking on Meter Network, combining the value of initial deposit and staking rewards. stMTRG tokens are minted upon deposit and burned when redeemed. While the price of stMTRG to MTRG is based on the market demand, stMTRG token balances are pegged 1:1 to the MTRG that are staked by Meter Liquid Staking Module and the tokenâ€™s balances are updated daily to reflect earnings and rewards.
